name: Pixel Survival
description:
Please try out our new game, Pixel Survival! Pixel Survival is a classic survival game set in a beautifully-realized pixel world.

Welcome to the beautiful and dangerous world of Pixel Survival! Your initial goals are to find food and drink, collect resources and craft tools. But beware of monsters sneaking up on you!

HOW TO PLAY: Use the right and left arrow keys to control your character's movement. Use the red button to attack and to collect resources.

Game features:
-survival game free
-cool pixel art
-old school gameplay
-too many items

Pixel Survival – it’s time for fun! Explore every pixel of the map, upgrade your equipment, but watch your back!
